attributes.action: Call a press conference to show off his Bruce Forsyth impression
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the popularity of the prime minister falling by the day, we feel the only way for Mr Tony Blair to regain his credibility as a leader is by  calling a press conference to show the worlds press his Bruce Forsyth impression.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
